job.title: Finnish-Speaking Customer Expert
job.description:
Requirements for Candidates::
We are looking for a
Customer Expert
who speaks both
Finnish
and
English
to join our Customer Support Team. You will be working for our client, one of the biggest online accommodation providers worldwide. If you have:
Excellent Finnish and English language skills (verbal and written)
Strong communication and administration skills
Customer-focused approach
Positive attitude
Permit to work in Estonia
then this job might be for you

Responsibilities::
Handling incoming phone calls and emails from the website users
Acting as an intermediary between the customers and accommodations
Managing reservations, special requests and complaints and finding solutions to website users´ inquiries

What we offer::
Working hours from Monday-Friday between 9:00-18:00 (9:00 - 17:30; 9:30 - 18:00)
Full training
Supportive team
Sport compensation (Stebby)
Fun company and team events (monthly)
Bonus system
Work from home
